name: The Last Good Emperor of Rome
description: "You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength." even though I haven't actually finished the book, Marcus Aurelius's Meditations has had a profound impact on my life. Instead of finishing the book, I decided to paint a statue of him instead. I signed it last year because that's where my head's at ðŸ™ƒ. Inspired by the style of @steventheartist
